section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on December 29, 2022.*
section.heading: Grants.
section.text: Notwithstanding part B of subchapter XII-A of Chapter 3 of Title 1, the Mayor may make grants to nonprofit organizations and other entities to provide services and supports to recent immigrants to the United States arriving in the District.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-773.04, see § 104 of Migrant Services and Supports Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-553, Sept. 30, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 104 of Migrant Services and Supports Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-553, Sept. 30, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
